alert.note: Alert for Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Northumberland, east central Richmond and southeastern Westmoreland Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kinsale, or near Callao, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lewisetta around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lottsburg, Threeway, Village, Avalon, Oldhams, Hull Neck, Edwardsville, Opheila, Middletons Corner and Westmoreland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
